pages.page: Let’s face it — navigating the healthcare system isn’t easy. In fact, it can be confusing and stressful. When you need care, you want to make the best choice possible using information about the quality of the providers and estimated cost of the medical procedures. HealthEngine can help.

With HealthEngine you finally have a way to be a savvy healthcare consumer. You can now make your healthcare dollars go farther by knowing the approximate price you’ll pay for a medical service when you select a provider. Search for physicians, facilities and nearly 200 medical services including diagnostics (e.g. Mammogram or colonoscopy), imaging (e.g. MRI), surgery and routine medical care. Then choose how much you want to save.

WE CONNECT YOU TO QUALITY CARE AT A GREAT VALUE: Learn more about the provider and know the estimated cost of the service before you schedule an appointment. WE MINIMIZE THE GUESSWORK AND UNWELCOME SURPRISES: You’ll know the estimated price of a service before you receive it. We’ll help you avoid surprises when you receive a bill from your physician. WE HELP YOU MAXIMIZE YOUR EXISTING BENEFITS: We give you the information you need to make informed choices about how to spend your healthcare dollars — all within your current health insurance and in-network providers. WE’RE JUST A PHONE CALL AWAY: We’re your partner as you navigate the healthcare system. Our Care Concierge team is here to save you time by scheduling appointments for you, setting your expectations about estimated costs and billing, and answering any questions you might have about your insurance. Call us at 877.772.5595.

Getting Started Is Easy STEP 1: Sign up for HealthEngine at healthengine.com STEP 2: Search for the procedure, specialty, or 2 provider you need and receive results that give you information to make the best decision based on quality and estimated cost savings. 1
STEP 3: Learn more about a provider before you make a decision. Simply click on the provider’s name to see information about their background, experience, location, and more. 3

4 STEP 4: Click on “request appointment” to get the scheduling process started. Let us know your time and date preferences and our Care Concierge will take care of the rest. CALL US if you ever have any questions ... about your insurance, your upcoming appointment, or anything. We’re here to help! GET STARTED by signing up at cdw.healthengine.com or by calling us at 877.772.5595. Learn more at healthengine.com.
